response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our flagship product, which I believe would significantly enhance your business operations and contribute immensely to your success. This product holds immense value for us, but recognizing its importance to you, we are excited to offer it at an exclusive price tailored to your needs. We propose to sell the product to you for $950,000. This special offer reflects our commitment to fostering long-term partnerships with clients like yourself who appreciate the true worth of our innovative solutions. Please let us know if this proposal aligns with your expectations and budget, so we can proceed to finalize the transaction.", "product_price": 950000}
